item.description:
Lost in the sideways world. The TV series Lost comes to an end on Sunday May 23rd, 7pm.





A Meetup to discuss what you liked most about Jin, Sun, Sawyer, Richard, Hugo, Kate, Ben, Desmond, etc. and the story lines of Lost.

Who is Jacob? What do the various symbols mean? How much influence have the fans had on the stories? What are your favorite Lost theories? What is Lost's connection to C.S. Lewis?

What are some of the most memorable scenes from the past seasons? Best twist? Best beach montage scene? What thematic motifs on Lost worked best?

What is your favorite quote from the series?

Join us for a fun discussion of all things Lost.






If the weather is good, we'll hold our discussion in the park near the Au Bon Pain, just beyond the Davis Sq. Subway station. If the weather is not good, we'll meet inside the Au Bon Pain. Either way, we'll start from the Au Bon Pain in Davis Sq.






How will it all end?









4, 8, 15, 16, 23, 42
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting at the tables outside the Au Bon Pain.
item.name: Lost: The End
